description: Local desktop tool that scans YouTube channels, matches Shorts to long-form videos, and bulk-inserts links into descriptions

features.name: Google OAuth Integration
features.description: User signs in with Google OAuth (local loopback) to grant read/update video metadata permissions

features.name: Secure Token Storage
features.description: Store OAuth tokens locally using OS keychain or encrypted file

features.name: Multi-Channel Support
features.description: Support 'switch channel' if account manages multiple channels

features.name: Token Persistence
features.description: Tokens persist across app restarts securely

features.name: Channel Upload Scan
features.description: Pull uploads list with videoId, title, description, publish date, duration

features.name: Existing Link Detection
features.description: Detect any existing links already in video descriptions

features.name: Incremental Scanning
features.description: Full scan first time, then 'scan new since last run' option

features.name: Scan Progress Indicator
features.description: Progress bar updates during pagination with videos scanned / total

features.name: Large Channel Support
features.description: Handle 5k-50k videos with pagination + incremental indexing

features.name: Duration-Based Classification
features.description: Classify videos ≤60 seconds as likely Shorts

features.name: Hashtag Detection
features.description: Detect #shorts in title/description for stronger Short signal

features.name: Ambiguous Bucket
features.description: Handle edge cases: ≤60s without #shorts, slightly >60s with Short patterns

features.name: Manual Override
features.description: User can override classification in review UI, persists through rescans

features.name: Classification Summary
features.description: Display stats tiles: Likely Shorts / Likely Long / Needs Review

features.name: Title Similarity Scoring
features.description: Score matches based on title similarity (0-40 points)

features.name: Keyword Overlap Scoring
features.description: Score matches based on keyword overlap from title/description (0-20 points)

features.name: Publish Proximity Scoring
features.description: Score matches based on publish date proximity (0-25 points)

features.name: Existing Link Detection
features.description: Negative score (-20) if already linked to avoid duplicates

features.name: Confidence Threshold
features.description: Configurable threshold (default 70) for auto-approve vs needs review

features.name: Multiple Candidates
features.description: Show top candidate + 2-3 alternates per Short

features.name: Publish Window Filter
features.description: Option to match only within N days (default 14)

features.name: Match Review Table
features.description: Table with Short title, Matched long video, Confidence, Status, Action columns

features.name: Bulk Approve/Reject
features.description: Bulk approve all matches ≥ threshold, bulk reject selected

features.name: Manual Match Selection
features.description: Per-row manual select of different long video from dropdown

features.name: Search and Filter
features.description: Search by title/ID, filter by confidence, date, status

features.name: Export Matches CSV
features.description: Export current matches to CSV for external review

features.name: Short Description Link Strategy
features.description: Insert long-form link into Short description via videos.update (MVP)

features.name: Long Description Highlights
features.description: Add Shorts 'Highlights' links into long-form descriptions (Pro)

features.name: Playlist Creation
features.description: Create playlist per long video and add matched Shorts (Pro)

features.name: Template Editor
features.description: Customizable link template with variables: {LONG_URL}, {LONG_TITLE}

features.name: Safe Update Algorithm
features.description: Fetch existing snippet, modify only description, include required fields in update

features.name: Required Fields Handling
features.description: Include id, snippet.title, snippet.categoryId in update request

features.name: Batch Processing
features.description: Apply changes in batches of N (default 10-25)

features.name: Retry with Backoff
features.description: Retry transient failures with exponential backoff

features.name: Quota Handling
features.description: Pause on 'forbidden' or quota exhaustion, show warning

features.name: Progress Tracking
features.description: Show progress + success/fail counters + per-item log

features.name: Pause/Resume
features.description: User can pause and resume batch apply job

features.name: Preview Before Apply
features.description: Show before → after for 5 random videos before applying

features.name: Before/After Logging
features.description: Log before_description and after_description for each change

features.name: Export Report CSV
features.description: Export shortId, longId, confidence, action taken, timestamp

features.name: Rollback JSON Export
features.description: Export videoId → original description + metadata for revert

features.name: Rollback Execution
features.description: One-click revert using rollback file to restore descriptions

features.name: Videos Table
features.description: Store video_id, title, description, published_at, duration_seconds, inferred_type

features.name: Matches Table
features.description: Store short_id, long_id, confidence, status, reason_json

features.name: Jobs Table
features.description: Store job_id, type, status, started_at, ended_at, counters_json

features.name: Change Log Table
features.description: Store change_id, video_id, before/after description, result, error_json

features.name: Wizard Flow
features.description: 11-screen wizard: Welcome → Connect → Scan → Classify → Match → Review → Strategy → Preview → Apply → Done

features.name: Desktop App Shell
features.description: Electron or Tauri app with React + TypeScript + TailwindCSS

features.name: Diff Viewer
features.description: Before → after description diff viewer component

features.name: License Key Validation
features.description: License key entry + local-first validation

features.name: Trial Mode
features.description: Trial mode works without activation with limited features

features.name: Auto Updates
features.description: App auto-updates check and install (optional)

features.name: Link Performance Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard showing click-through rates from Shorts to linked long-form videos

features.name: Channel Growth Metrics
features.description: Track subscriber growth and view count changes after linking

features.name: Revenue Impact Tracking
features.description: Estimate ad revenue impact of redirecting Short viewers to long-form content

features.name: Export Analytics CSV
features.description: Export analytics data as CSV for external analysis

features.name: Weekly Email Summary
features.description: Automated weekly email with linking stats and recommendations

features.name: AI Transcript Matching
features.description: Use AI to compare Short and long-form transcripts for semantic matching

features.name: Thumbnail Visual Similarity
features.description: Compare thumbnails using image embeddings to suggest matches

features.name: Tag-Based Matching
features.description: Match Shorts to long-form videos based on shared tags and keywords

features.name: Match Confidence Score
features.description: Display confidence percentage for each suggested match

features.name: Manual Match Override
features.description: Allow user to manually link any Short to any long-form video

features.name: Batch Match Approval
features.description: Select multiple suggested matches and approve them in one action

features.name: Incremental Channel Scan
features.description: Only scan new videos since last scan instead of full channel rescan

features.name: Multi-Channel Support
features.description: Manage and scan multiple YouTube channels from one account

features.name: Scheduled Auto-Scan
features.description: Configure automatic scans on a daily/weekly schedule

features.name: Scan Progress Indicator
features.description: Real-time progress bar showing scan status with video count

features.name: Playlist-Based Scanning
features.description: Scan specific playlists instead of entire channel

features.name: Video Preview Thumbnails
features.description: Show video thumbnails in match review UI for visual identification

features.name: Drag-Drop Match Reordering
features.description: Reorder match priority via drag-and-drop in review list

features.name: Filter by Match Status
features.description: Filter Shorts by linked, unlinked, pending review status

features.name: Search Videos by Title
features.description: Search and filter videos by title or description keywords

features.name: Video Stats Display
features.description: Show view count, likes, and publish date for each video in UI

features.name: Bulk Select All Unlinked
features.description: One-click select all unlinked Shorts for batch operations

features.name: Settings Preferences Panel
features.description: User preferences for default matching algorithm, scan interval, theme

features.name: System Tray Integration
features.description: Minimize to system tray with notification badge for completed scans

features.name: Dry Run Preview
features.description: Preview all description changes before applying without modifying YouTube

features.name: Rate Limit Respect
features.description: Automatically respect YouTube API rate limits with exponential backoff

features.name: Description Backup Before Edit
features.description: Store full original description locally before any modification

features.name: Undo Last Batch
features.description: One-click undo to revert the most recent batch of description updates

features.name: Conflict Detection
features.description: Detect if a video description was modified externally since last scan

features.name: Link Placement Templates
features.description: Configurable templates for where/how links are inserted in descriptions

features.name: Custom Call-to-Action Text
features.description: Customizable CTA text around inserted links (e.g., 'Watch full video:')

features.name: Timestamp Deep Links
features.description: Link to specific timestamps in long-form videos matching Short content

features.name: Multi-Link Support
features.description: Insert multiple related long-form video links per Short

features.name: Local SQLite Database
features.description: Store all video metadata and match history in local SQLite database

features.name: Caching Layer for API Calls
features.description: Cache YouTube API responses to minimize quota usage

features.name: Background Processing
features.description: Run scans and batch updates in background threads without freezing UI

features.name: Pagination for Large Channels
features.description: Handle channels with 1000+ videos using pagination

features.name: Export Match Report
features.description: Export complete match report as PDF or HTML

features.name: Export Video Inventory
features.description: Export full video inventory (Shorts + long-form) as CSV

features.name: Import Previous Matches
features.description: Import match data from CSV to restore or migrate between machines

features.name: Desktop Notifications
features.description: Native OS notifications for scan completion and new unlinked Shorts

features.name: New Upload Detection Alert
features.description: Alert when new Shorts are detected that need linking

features.name: Error Alert System
features.description: Alert on API errors, quota exhaustion, or failed updates

features.name: Unit Tests for Matching Engine
features.description: Comprehensive unit tests for all matching algorithms

features.name: Integration Tests for YouTube API
features.description: Mocked integration tests for YouTube Data API v3 calls

features.name: E2E Test Suite
features.description: End-to-end tests covering full scan → match → apply workflow

features.name: Rollback Verification Tests
features.description: Tests verifying rollback correctly restores original descriptions

features.name: Multi-Language Description Support
features.description: Handle video descriptions in multiple languages when inserting links

features.name: RTL Language Support
features.description: Proper link insertion for right-to-left language descriptions

features.name: Encrypted Token Storage
features.description: Store OAuth tokens encrypted at rest using OS keychain

features.name: Token Refresh Flow
features.description: Automatic token refresh without requiring re-authentication

features.name: Audit Log
features.description: Local audit log of all description modifications with timestamps

features.name: YouTube API Quota Tracker
features.description: Real-time display of YouTube API quota usage and remaining budget

features.name: Quota-Aware Batch Sizing
features.description: Automatically adjust batch size based on remaining API quota

features.name: Quota Reset Countdown
features.description: Display countdown to next quota reset with queue management

features.name: Cross-Platform Build
features.description: Build installers for Windows, macOS, and Linux

features.name: Code Signing
features.description: Sign app binaries for macOS and Windows to avoid security warnings

features.name: CI/CD Pipeline
features.description: GitHub Actions pipeline for automated builds and releases

features.name: User Guide
features.description: In-app user guide with step-by-step linking workflow

features.name: FAQ and Troubleshooting
features.description: Built-in FAQ covering common issues like quota limits and auth errors

features.name: API Documentation
features.description: Developer documentation for extending matching algorithms

features.name: Keyboard Navigation
features.description: Full keyboard navigation support for all UI actions

features.name: Screen Reader Support
features.description: ARIA labels and screen reader compatible UI components

features.name: High Contrast Mode
features.description: High contrast theme option for visually impaired users

features.name: First-Run Wizard
features.description: Step-by-step setup wizard on first launch covering OAuth and channel selection

features.name: Sample Data Mode
features.description: Demo mode with sample data for exploring features before connecting YouTube

features.name: Tooltip Guided Tour
features.description: Interactive tooltip tour highlighting key features on first use

features.name: Video Tutorial Library
features.description: Embedded video tutorials for key workflows like scanning and batch linking
